thread.title: Google's Version of Instant Articles—Can It Beat Facebook by Being Open?
thread.title_full: Google's Version of Instant Articles—Can It Beat Facebook by Being Open?

title: Google's Version of Instant Articles—Can It Beat Facebook by Being Open?
text: Print Page by: Mathew Ingram | Fortune As Facebook continues to roll out its Instant Articles feature, which will give certain media partners better-looking and faster-loading mobile versions of their stories, Google is reportedly working on its own similar offering. However, there are some crucial differences with Google’s version, according to sources with knowledge of the project.
